snippet.title: Foreach Loop Container‎
snippet.description: The Foreach Loop container defines a repeating control flow in a package. The loop implementation is similar to Foreach looping structure in programming languages.

snippet.title: Optimize Powershell/PHP‎
snippet.description: I implemented a foreach loop directly in powershell and came up with .17 - .24 seconds. This might be more of a PHP issue than a powershell one.
